quests.mission_name: Eliminate 500 monsters from the Sacred Kingdom
quests.mission_description: Those who stand against the Chaos Sect must be eliminated.
You must choose your words carefully if you want to convert someone.
Once I show them the true power of the Chaos Sect, everyone will start believing in Chaos.
With Chaos, there's no limit to the strength you can achieve.
Treat practice like a real fight, and a real fight like practice.
When handling magical items, a deep understanding of Mana is essential.
I'd love to observe the power of a Spirit up close.
Seems like you need more training...

quests.mission_description: Extinguish the past remains and bring stability to Taranor.
Retrieve the bodies of the soldiers who sacrificed their lives for Taranor.
In order to master the spear, combat training is crucial.
You must expel all fear and develop your own unique spear craft.

ex_equip.name: Rin's Sparkling Rings
ex_equip.description: A pair of rings Basar gave Rin on her first birthday after he adopted her. They never lose their sheen, and they're much lighter than her other rings.

skills.description: Increases chance of activating Ring Throw by 20% when using Dazzling Dance.
skills.skill_description: Dazzles the enemy with a dance, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, before a 70% chance to use Ring Throw. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.description: Amount recovered is increased by 15% when using Showtime.
Dispels one debuff from all allies before the skill effect when using Showtime.
skills.skill_description: Dispels 1 debuff from all allies and heals them with an elegant dance, before granting two random buffs for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

ex_equip.name: A Treatise on Logic
ex_equip.description: An old book found in the royal library. Other than Romann, nobody has read it in a very long time.

skills.description: 75% chance to dispel one buff from the enemy when using Gravity Arrow.
skills.skill_description: Shoots gravity arrows at the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff, and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}}.

skills.description: Grants a barrier to the caster for 2 turns when using Gravitation. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
skills.skill_description: Attacks all enemies with a magic circle, with a 50% chance each to decrease Combat Readiness by {{variable}} four times, before granting the caster a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.description: 50% chance to dispel one buff each from all enemies when using Gravitation.
skills.skill_description: Attacks all enemies with a magic circle, with a 50% chance each to decrease Combat Readiness by {{variable}} four times, and a 50% chance to dispel one buff each from all enemies.

quests.mission_description: Train the Bellmice that have joined your cause.
Even if it's a mere superstition, everyone needs something they can rely on.
This is required to initiate a ritual that transmits the culture and knowledge of the Suin.
You must emerge victorious against the one you respect most in order to preserve your faith.

ex_equip.name: Valkyrie Wing
ex_equip.description: A mysterious circlet that symbolizes strength and beauty, and is the source of Rose's Fighting Spirit.

skills.description: Activates each effect regardless of current Health when using Sequential Cutter.
skills.skill_description: Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn, before increasing Defense of the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.description: Applies the same effect to the caster when using Shield of Light.
skills.skill_description: Covers an ally and the caster with the Shield of Light, dispelling two debuffs and granting a barrier for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.description: Decreases skill cooldown of Goddess of Victory by 1 turn.

ex_equip.name: Witch Hat
ex_equip.description: A magic hat that keeps your skin clear and wrinkle-free by completely blocking heat and UV rays.

skills.description: 30% chance to grant the caster an extra turn when using Spirit Absorb.
skills.skill_description: Absorbs the enemy's Attack, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns before recovering Health proportional to the damage dealt, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack of the enemy for 2 turns. Has a 30% chance of granting the caster an extra turn after attacking. When the enemy is defeated, cooldown does not increase.

skills.description: Inflicts vampiric touch for 2 turns when using Flame Kiss.
skills.skill_description: Swallows the enemy in the flame of Chatty, the magic lantern, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns, and inflicts vampiric touch for 2 turns.

skills.description: Dispels two buffs when using Flame Kiss. (Applies prior to inflicting burn debuff)
skills.skill_description: Swallows the enemy in the flame of Chatty, the magic lantern, dispelling two buffs, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

ex_equip.name: Shadow Wing
ex_equip.description: A circlet shaped like a pair of wings and consumed by an inner shadow. It reinvigorates the distorted desires of its wearer with new life.

skills.description: Dispels one more buff when using Spear of Darkness.
skills.skill_description: Leaps into the air and strikes at the enemy with a swordstorm, dispelling two buffs and decreasing Defense for 2 turns.

skills.description: Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by an additional 25% when using Goddess of Ruin.
skills.skill_description: Attacks all enemies with the Portent of Destruction, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 25%, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 25%, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by an additional 25%. Increases Effectiveness of the caster for 2 turns.

skills.description: Increases Combat Readiness effects of Goddess of Ruin by 5% each.
skills.skill_description: Attacks all enemies with the Portent of Destruction, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 30%, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 30%. Increases Effectiveness of the caster for 2 turns.

ex_equip.name: Queen's Keepsake
ex_equip.description: The only gift Sigret has ever received. Though little more than a decoration, she wears it daily.

skills.description: Increases the damage dealt by Sever by 20%.
Increases the chance of inflicting bleeding when using Sever by 20%.
Changes the conditions necessary to activate Sever when using Smash from 50% remaining Health to 75% remaining Health.
skills.skill_description: Batters the enemy with a scythe, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unhealable and inflict bleeding for 2 turns. When the enemy's Health is 75% or less after the attack, activates Sever as an extra attack with a 100% chance of inflicting bleeding.

ex_equip.name: Silver Lion's Protection
ex_equip.description: A shield with a lion motif regarded by Troublemaker Crozet as his most valued possession, which he uses in honor of his one true love.

skills.description: Increases Chivalry's counterattack chance by 15% when the ally in the back row is attacked.
skills.skill_description: Receives {{variable}} of damage suffered by the ally in the back row in their place. Only the highest damage distribution effect will be applied. Has a 50% chance to counterattack when the ally in the back row is attacked.

skills.description: Recovers the caster's Health when using Oath of Protection. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
skills.skill_description: Swears an oath of protection, dispelling all debuffs from the caster and one ally, before increasing Defense for 3 turns. Grants class enhancement to the ally for 3 turns, and recovers the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.description: Increases Combat Readiness of the target by 40% when using Oath of Protection.
skills.skill_description: Swears an oath of protection, dispelling all debuffs from the caster and one ally, before increasing Defense for 3 turns. Grants class enhancement to the ally for 3 turns, and increases their Combat Readiness by 40%.

ex_equip.name: Estyria
ex_equip.description: A beautiful, silver sword that cuts through its enemies delicately, like the winter wind.

skills.description: Dispels one more buff when using Sword Storm.
skills.skill_description: Attacks with a swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel two buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.description: Decreases cooldown of All-Out Attack by 1 turn when a buff is dispelled with Sword Storm.
skills.skill_description: Attacks with a swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff. Cooldown of All-Out Attack decreases by 1 turn when a buff is dispelled. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.description: Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by an additional 20% when using Commanding Shout.
skills.skill_description: Increases Attack and Critical Hit Chance of an ally for 2 turns, before increasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Increases Attack and Critical Hit Chance of the caster for 2 turns, before increasing Combat Readiness by 50%.

ex_equip.name: True Sight
ex_equip.description: An object that has been passed down among the greatest sorcerers since ancient times. It is said that even in total darkness, its blue light does not fade.

skills.description: Combat Readiness of the caster increases by an additional 5% when Vitality Drain results in a critical hit.
skills.skill_description: Smashes the enemy with a rock, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. A critical hit will increase the caster's Combat Readiness by an additional 15%.

skills.description: Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 50% when using Mana Amplification.
skills.skill_description: Fully amplifies mana, granting immunity to all allies for 3 turns before granting increased Attack (Greater) to the caster for 3 turns while increasing Attack of all allies except for the caster for 3 turns. Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

skills.description: Dispels one debuff from all allies before the skill effect when using Mana Amplification.
skills.skill_description: Fully amplifies mana, dispelling one debuff each from all allies before granting immunity to all allies for 3 turns and granting increased Attack (Greater) to the caster for 3 turns while increasing Attack of all allies except for the caster for 3 turns.

quests.mission_description: The most important thing about being a treasure hunter is knowing where treasure can be found.
This tiny badge is used by many treasure hunters as a lucky charm.

quests.mission_name: Acquire 1,000 Equipment Crafting Materials in Hunt
quests.mission_description: A lot of materials are required to make sure we're properly geared up for adventure.
It's time to break through the wild animals and take the treasure for ourselves!

ex_equip.name: Dun Blyraia's Dark Blessing
ex_equip.description: A quiver made with Mana from the dimension that Wanderer Silk came from, known to maximize her concentration.

skills.description: Grants the caster an extra attack regardless of whether the enemy is debuffed when using Automatic Fire.
skills.skill_description: Fires a volley of arrows at the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%. After the attack, grants the caster an extra attack with the same skill. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.description: Dispels one buff from the enemy when using Shock Arrow. (This effect is applied before inflicting silence.)
skills.skill_description: Shoots an arrow infused with the power of lightning, dispelling one buff before inflicting silence and making them unhealable for 2 turns, and decreasing Combat Readiness by 100%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.description: Increases Speed of all allies for 2 turns when using Shock Arrow.
skills.skill_description: Shoots an arrow infused with the power of lightning, inflicting silence and making them unhealable for 2 turns, and decreasing Combat Readiness by 100%, before increasing Speed of all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

ex_equip.name: Azure Dragon's Spirit
ex_equip.description: A ribbon with special powers that allows the wearer to harness their innate dragon powers.

skills.description: 35% chance to extend the caster's buff durations by 1 turn when using Double Slash.
skills.skill_description: Attacks by swinging their weapon, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, before a 35% chance to extend the caster's buff durations by 1 turn.

skills.description: Damage dealt is increased by 30% when using Double Slash.
Increases chance of inflicting silence with Dragon's Roar by 15%.

ex_equip.name: Small Drone Tuna
ex_equip.description: Tuna is a drone made by Yuna. No matter where she goes, on Earth or on Orbis, Tuna is there to protect her.

skills.description: Combat Readiness increases by an additional 1% per target when using Homing Laser.
skills.skill_description: Attacks all enemies with a drone before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 7% per target and all other allies by 3% per target. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.

skills.description: Has a 30% chance each to grant allies increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns when using Upgrade.
skills.skill_description: Buffs all allies with a drone and increases Attack and Speed for 2 turns, with a 30% chance each to grant allies increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns.

skills.description: Damage dealt is increased by 30% when using Meteor Cannon.
